trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器提供设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is a container for a group of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls.
An application renders a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the client browser based on criteria that the application defines.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序呈现特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件添加到客户端浏览器基于应用程序定义的条件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: The MultiViewDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: MultiViewDesigner 类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>可视设计器中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MultiViewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates that the <xref uid="langword_csharp_nowrap" name="nowrap" href=""></xref> HTML attribute should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示<xref uid="langword_csharp_nowrap" name="nowrap" href=""></xref>不应使用 HTML 特性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。
